meanings.definition: The use of a phrase or expression characteristic of a particular person or group.
meanings.sent1: Her eonisms always make us laugh during our meetings.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's eonisms were a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's eonisms at the dinner table never fail to entertain us.
meanings.sent4: The eonisms of the famous author echoed through the literary world.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the eonisms of my favorite teacher.

meanings.definition: The act of imitating or adopting the style or mannerisms of a particular era or time period.
meanings.sent1: The movie's eonisms perfectly captured the 80s vibe.
meanings.sent2: She studied the eonisms of the Victorian era for her history project.
meanings.sent3: His Halloween costume was a hilarious mix of eonisms from different time periods.
meanings.sent4: The play's eonisms transported the audience back in time.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the eonisms of ancient civilizations.
